external_references.source_name: Trend Micro MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD HIUPAN SEPTEMBER 2024
external_references.description: Lenart Bermejo, Sunny Lu, Ted Lee. (2024, September 9). Earth Preta Evolves its Attacks with New Malware and Strategies. Retrieved August 4, 2025.
Nick Dai, Vickie Su, Sunny Lu. (2022, November 18). Earth Preta Spear-Phishing Governments Worldwide. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [PUBLOAD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1228) has used `tasklist` to gather running processes on victim host.(Citation: Trend Micro MUSTANG PANDA PUBLOAD HIUPAN SEPTEMBER 2024) [PUBLOAD](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1228) has also leveraged the `OpenEventA` Windows API function to check whether the same process was already running.(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload)
